summary:
All-round oil and gas professional with a background in geosciences. Experience in leading teams and projects in various international environments. Strong analytical skills, inquisitive and able to handle multiple priorities. Showing resilience and deliver under tight deadlines. Enjoys working in multi-cultural environments, bringing together a multitude of views to tackle complex challenges.

Core competencies:
•	Coaching, mentoring and development of staff
•	Partner, regulator and internal  / external stakeholder engagement
•	Leading geoscience and well delivery teams with assurance of technical work
•	Shell accredited Technical Authority on several geoscience subjects
•	Broad knowledge of various depositional settings , including carbonates and deepwater clastics
•	Operational geology, including geohazard identification and mitigation
•	Seismic interpretation, velocity modelling , depth conversion and structural uncertainty analysis
